trans-unit.source: The type of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession" /> associated with the cannel.
trans-unit.target: 與通道相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: Defines the interface that associates a channel with a specific type of session.
trans-unit.target: 定義會將通道與工作階段之特定型別產生關聯的介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601> interface is the base interface for session-based channels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601> 介面是工作階段型通道的基底介面。

trans-unit.source: It associates the type of session with the channel by setting the generic type parameter `TSession` to a type that implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession> interface in a way that reflects its role in the message exchange.
trans-unit.target: 它會將工作階段的型別與通道產生關聯，其方式是將泛型型別參數 `TSession` 設定為實作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession> 介面的型別，藉以在訊息交換中反映其角色。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `TSession` is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> for an incoming session on the receiving side of a one-way communication, to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> for an outgoing session on the sending side of a one-way communication, and to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession> for a duplex session for a bi-directional communication pattern.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在單向通訊之接收端的傳入工作階段中，`TSession` 會設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>，在單向通訊之傳送端的傳出工作階段上則設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>，而在雙向通訊模式的雙工工作階段上則設定為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601> interface provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property to retrieve the session with which the channel is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601> 介面提供了 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> 屬性，以擷取與通道相關聯的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of session associated with this channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此通道相關聯之工作階段的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession" /> associated with this channel.
trans-unit.target: 與此通道相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISession" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: This returns the generic parameter `TSession` used to define the interface.
trans-unit.target: 這樣會傳回用來定義介面的泛型參數 `TSession`。
